data.name: گیکسپرتس
data.description: Geeksperts is a technology company that connects people with technology services. We offer rapid in home and on-demand support and consultation for customers in need of technology support or services. Utilizing a national workforce of background-checked and skilled experts, Geeksperts offers affordable on-site and 24/7 online technical support and training services ranging from mobile phone repair to smart home automation installation, setup and monitoring.
